title: Amend a Uk Savings Account Request
description: Amend a Uk Savings Account Request

taxedUkInterest.description: Total net taxed interest for the specified savings account. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places. Note: If taxedUkInterest is not provided, then any existing values will be removed.

untaxedUkInterest.description: Total untaxed interest for the specified savings account. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places. Note: If untaxedUkInterest is not provided, then any existing values will be removed.
